text: Christopher Schultz (February 16, 1960 â€“ March 4, 2021) was a Canadian professional football player. He was an offensive tackle in the National Football League (NFL) and Canadian Football League (CFL). He played with the CFL Toronto Argonauts. Schultz played college football at the University of Arizona. He was a sportscaster with Canadian sports television channel TSN. Schultz died of a heart attack in Burlington, Ontario on March 4, 2021 at the age of 61. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Canadian players of American football Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Dallas Cowboys players Category:Sportspeople from Ontario Category:Sports commentators Category:Toronto Argonauts players
title: Chris Schultz
